body_html:
It looks like there are also options for gridlstm and more:

+### Fused RNNCells
+@@LSTMFusedCell
+
+### LSTM-like cells
+@@CoupledInputForgetGateLSTMCell
+@@TimeFreqLSTMCell
+@@GridLSTMCell

if I understand it correctly, would we call:

cell = tf.rnn_cell.GridLSTMCell(size)

body:
It looks like there are also options for gridlstm and more:

+### Fused RNNCells
 +@@LSTMFusedCell
 +
 +### LSTM-like cells
 +@@CoupledInputForgetGateLSTMCell
 +@@TimeFreqLSTMCell
 +@@GridLSTMCell

if I understand it correctly, would we call:

`cell = tf.rnn_cell.GridLSTMCell(size)`
